text:
Created attachment 25347
Documentation patch for setclasspath.sh

The comments state that the script sets CLASSPATH, however that is not the case.

Patch to document what the file actually does.
creator: sebb@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text: Alternative patch based on the supplied patch applied to both .sh and .bat files in 7.0.x. Will be included in 7.0.1 onwards.
